DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of single doses of NSA-789 on the P50 component of the auditory evoked potentials and to assess the safety, tolerability and the concentration of NSA-789 in the blood, in nonsmoking patients with schizophrenia.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Effects Of Single Oral Doses Of NSA-789 On Auditory P50 Suppression In Schizophrenic Patients
